mapper.insert: insert into shop (p_id, p_name, p_content, p_num, p_price, p_state, p_family, p_genus, p_picture, s_id) values (#{pId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pFamily,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pGenus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update shop set p_name = #{pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_content = #{pContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_num = #{pNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, p_price = #{pPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, p_state = #{pState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, p_family = #{pFamily,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_genus = #{pGenus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_picture = #{pPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s_id = #{sId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select p_id, p_name, p_content, p_num, p_price, p_state, p_family, p_genus, p_picture, s_id from shop where p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and p_state=1
select p_id, p_name, p_content, p_num, p_price, p_state, p_family, p_genus, p_picture, s_id from shop where p_state=1
select p_id, p_name, p_content, p_num, p_price, p_state, p_family, p_genus, p_picture, s_id from shop where p_family =#{condition} and p_state=1
select * from shop where p_name like CONCAT('%', #{productName},'%') and p_state=1
